comment: Very laid back professor, he posts weekly assignments but does not grade them until the end of the semester. No exams or quizzes, only assignments. The material can get confusing, but he posts videos that can help out.

Literally has done nothing all semester. Has not taught a single piece of material, simply posts random tests and assignments from as far back as the 90s. When confronting him, he is very knowledgeable but acts as if everyone is already a pro at the material. If you take him online, you will learn absolutely nothing!!! HWK is never graded. No help!

I had Wilson for SURV 2221 and 2221L and enjoyed it. He allows that class to use notes on the tests and clearly explains the tests before you take it. His lectures are clear and concise and it is obvious that he knows what he is talking about. He is normally pretty relaxed concerning deadlines and just wants you to know the material.
